channel.title: Pages on Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Yale Undergraduate Quantum Computing

item.title: About
item.description: Purpose We are an academic organization formed to promote and facilitate the participation of undergraduates in quantum information science at Yale. Activites Networking, Resources, Projects, Events. (Depending on member interests.) Develop open Source Quantum Computing Club Projects Study Groups Social Hours (Quantum Chess, Trivia, etc) YuQC Invited Speaker Series Host Tours of Academic and Industry Quantum Computing Labs Quantum Coalition (Hackathon) Facilitate Outreach to HS Students Build a network of peers, mentors, professionals and alumni Resources and opportunities and more… Membership Membership form: https://forms.
